datasets.name: genes.csv
datasets.description: This dataset contains paired gene expression data for 33 individuals, with each pair representing expression levels before infection (NI2) and after infection (YP2). Each row corresponds to a gene (identified by Ensembl ID in GeneName and gene symbol), except for the first row (GeneName: 'TotalCountsForNormalization->'), which provides total expression counts across all genes for normalization. Columns include gene identifiers and expression counts for each individual’s pre- and post-infection samples, suitable for differential expression analysis such as log_2 fold-changes.

raw.name: GeneName
raw.description: Ensembl ID for each gene (e.g., ENSG00000164307) in all rows except the first, where it is 'TotalCountsForNormalization->' to indicate total expression counts across all genes for each sample, used for normalization.

raw.name: GeneSymbol
raw.description: Standard gene symbol (e.g., ERAP1, ERAP2, LNPEP, ICOS, CTLA4) or '-' for non-gene rows (e.g., the normalization row).

raw.name: AF159_NI2
raw.description: Expression count for individual AF159 before infection (non-infected, NI2).

raw.name: AF159_YP2
raw.description: Expression count for individual AF159 after infection (YP2).

queries.question: Visualize the distribution of log_2 fold-change for LNPEP using violin plot, overlaying individual data points and highlighting the mean ± standard deviation and save it as LNPEP_foldchange.png
